name: GREY MILK
description:
You are a part of one’s imagination and are doomed to relive the same loop over and over again. By the way, you are a cat. On roller skates. So good luck!

You can jump and gain speed by moving your paws. Take care though - if you hit an object while moving too fast, you will lose a part of your health. If you lose all your health, you will have to start all over.

While moving at your own pace, you will be approached by some human through the power of text messaging. This will initiate a dialogue - and who knows what that can lead to? Reply to this human by choosing an appropriate answer. Some answers will regain your health, while others can lead to a unique ending.

Controls:

A or D - acceleration. To achieve higher speed, use different keys, and not the same one in a row.

A and D - stop. This will help you lessen the chance of colliding with things.

Space - jump.

LMB - select an option in the dialogue.

Health loss can happen only when you collide with objects while moving too fast (the high speed is indicated by green particles). Remember, that you can regain some health if you choose certain options in the dialogue.

Ending:

The game has 2 endings (3 endings if you count the health loss ending). Achieving the non-default ending may require you playing around with different dialogue options and hearing how the game reacts to them.

Игра была разработана во время участия в геймджеме Ludum Dare 47 от Сообщества авторов “Индикатор".

The game was developed during Ludum Dare 47, authors community "Indicator" edition.
